topic.title: Setup
topic.section: After creating a conference website by using Website Mangement (See {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.websiteManagement" text="Website Management"}) and a scheduled instance of the conference by using Scheduled Conferences (See {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.scheduledConferences" text="Scheduled Conferences"}), the Conference Manager should next complete the three Current Conference Setup steps.
